summary: SummaryMediheal's Hyaluronate Ultra Hydration Cleanser delivers soft, meringue-cream foam that intensely hydrates while gently cleansing away impurities, leaving your skin soft and supple.
details: DetailsBenefitsDense whipped-cream foam gently cleanses with fine, tightly packed micro-bubbles.Soft, low-irritant, mildly alkaline meringue-cream foam keeps skin balanced with a pH of 9.5â€“10.5.Leaves skin refreshed, smooth, and deeply cleansed.Key Ingredients95% Pure Liposome Hyaluronic Acid - Provides deep, long-lasting hydrationMicro-size Hyaluronic Acid - Penetrates for enhanced moisture deliveryResearch ResultsIntensive deep hydration: +105.01% after use10-hour hydration after cleansing: 142.7% improvement after useDeep pore cleansing power: 99.96% improvement after useItem 2648313How To UseAdd water to create a creamy foam, gently massage onto the face, then rinse. Suitable for daily facial cleansing.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Palm Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glyceryl Stearate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Polyquaternium-7, Sodium Phytate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Butylene Glycol, Ceramide NP, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Panthenol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Papain, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum).
how_to_use: Add water to create a creamy foam, gently massage onto the face, then rinse. Suitable for daily facial cleansing.
